disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Friend of the Forest.

blurb.value: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

description.value: Innate: Ivern cannot attack nor damage non-epic monsters. Instead, targeting a jungle camp initiates a 2.5 seconds channel that, upon completion, places the monsters within a grove. Placing a grove costs  131.63 − 121 (based on level) health and  148.5 − 110.25 (based on level) mana, and cannot be placed if Ivern lacks the amount of resources. The channel cannot be cancelled in the first 0.15 seconds and in the last 0.5 seconds.

description2.value: The grove matures over 40 − 1 (based on level) seconds. When fully matured, Ivern can interact with the camp again to free the monsters after a 0.5-second cast time, sending them away while receiving their full gold and  full experience bounties. Smiting a large monster within a grove will instantly free the camp's monsters, regardless of its maturity or the monsters' current health.

description3.value: If the camp's large monster has already been slain, Ivern will free the camp upon completing the channel at no cost. Similarly, the grove will instantly mature if the large monster is slain.

description4.value: Starting at level 5, freeing the Red Brambleback or the Blue Sentinel leaves behind a sapling for 1 minute that can be picked up by an allied champion to gain the camp's buff, consuming it in the process. If at least one allied champion is nearby, Ivern can pick up the sapling to transfer it to the nearest one in range. If an ally kills either monster, they also leave behind a sapling that only Ivern can consume.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Freeing a Krugs camp will only give the gold and  experience of the present Krugs, i.e the Ancient Krug and a Medium Krug, for a total of  70 − 87.5 (based on monster's level) experience instead of 160 − 200 (based on monster's level), and 75 gold instead of 125. Friend of the Forest can be used while Ivern or the camp is in combat and, once the grove is placed, Smite can be used to instantly claim the camp. Interrupting Ivern's channel is the only way to contest jungle camps, short of killing the camp during the channel time. Friend of the Forest will leave Ivern at 1 health if cast with exactly the required amount. Friend of the Forest cannot be cast with less, unlike other abilities with health costs. The following table refers for interactions while Ivern is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Interrupts Abilities Interrupts Movement Interrupts Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Disabled N/A Interrupted by Flash Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Damaging effectsDeath Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Rootcaller.

blurb.value: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

description.value: Active: Ivern throws a vine in the target direction, dealing magic damage to the first enemy hit and rooting and revealing them for a short duration. Ivern can recast Rootcaller if it hits a target.

description2.value: Ivern and his allies can click on the target rooted by Rootcaller to dash to their location, with allies stopping at  their attack range and Ivern stopping at  125 range from the target.

description3.value: Recast: Ivern dashes to the target.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Rootcaller will hit monsters but does not deal damage to them unless they were an epic monster. Ivern's pull/attack range is determined when he dashes to the target - not from when he initially casts Rootcaller and throws the vine. Ivern is not able to dash to the target unless they are within approximately 1200 range. PENDING FOR TEST: This also counts for allies. Rootcaller cannot be used to dash while grounded or rooted. This applies to Ivern and his allies. Rootcaller's dash does not follow targets, their position at the time of starting the dash is the location Ivern and his allies will stop from. Rootcaller is always cast from the original casting position.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Brushmaker.

blurb.value: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

description.value: Passive: While in brush, Ivern's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. This bonus persists for 3 seconds after leaving brush.

description2.value: Ivern periodically stocks a Brushmaker charge, up to a maximum of 3.

description3.value: Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush at the target location for 30 seconds, revealing the area within and around it for 3 seconds. Brushmaker spawns more brush if used near terrain or other brush.

description4.value: Brush grown in the line of sight of enemy turrets will cause Ivern and allied units within the brush to be exposed.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The bonus magic damage applies to towers. PENDING FOR TEST: Passive's interactions with dodging, blocking, and blinding effects.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Triggerseed.

blurb.value: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.

description.value: Active: Ivern gifts a Triggerseed to the target allied champion, himself or Daisy, shielding them for 2 seconds.

description2.value: At the end of its duration, Triggerseed bursts, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies and slowing them for 2 seconds.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Placing Triggerseed on allied champions grants them all kill credits it causes. PENDING FOR TEST: The magic damage benefits from Ivern's  magic penetration.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Daisy!.

blurb.value: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.

description.value: Active: Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy at his side to the target location, who remains on the field for up to 60 seconds as a controllable pet.

description2.value: Recast: Ivern commands Daisy! to move to the target location. If cast on Ivern, Daisy will follow him.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Daisy, when the ability is initially cast, is untargetable until she lands.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
